ledgermind.title: LedgerMind
ledgermind.problem: Personal finance tools fragment data across banks, budgets, and AI assistants with little explainability.
ledgermind.solution: Unified ledger ingestion, grounded NL → SQL analytics, and explainable AI suggestions with traceable references.
ledgermind.description: Private-by-default finances with explainable ML suggestions and NL → SQL analytics.
ledgermind.goals: Private-by-default finances with explainable ML suggestions and NL → SQL analytics.
outcomes: Deterministic tools with friendly LLM rephrase

datapipe-ai.title: DataPipe AI
datapipe-ai.problem: Kubernetes/GKE operations generate noisy metrics and manual pipelines—operators react instead of anticipating.
datapipe-ai.solution: Agent monitors telemetry, predicts scaling / failures, and automates pipeline deployment + remediation actions.
datapipe-ai.description: AI-powered ops agent for GKE deployments with automated data pipeline management and intelligent monitoring.
datapipe-ai.goals: Streamline Kubernetes operations with AI-driven automation, providing intelligent monitoring and automated data pipeline management for GKE deployments.

images.alt: DataPipe AI dashboard showing GKE cluster management and monitoring

clarity.title: Clarity Companion
clarity.problem: Writers receive vague style feedback; privacy concerns limit use of cloud AI for iterative editing.
clarity.solution: Local extension enforces clarity heuristics with coverage gates and offline-friendly analysis loop.
clarity.description: On‑device writing clarity assistant with strict coverage gates and localized UI.
clarity.goals: On‑device writing clarity assistant with strict coverage gates and localized UI.
